title: MarQ By Flipkart 90 L Direct Cool Single Door 1 Star Refrigerator  (Dark Grey, 100BD1MQG)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, User Manual, 1 Ice Cube Tray
product_specification.Other Features: Heavy Duty Glass Shelf, Smart Storage Spaces, Super Chill Zone, Temperature Control Knob, Long Lasting Freshness, Sleek Design, Recessed Handle, Anti-Bacterial Gasket, Clean with Ease, Disturbance Free, Noise Level: 42 dB, Voltage Range: 180 - 260 V
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: For Warranty claims or any product related issues please email at marq@flipkart.com or call us at 080-46609211
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 5 Years on Compressor Warranty from MarQ by Flipkart
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Spacious Interiors: Provides ample space with deep door capacity to store bottles, cans, food items, etc. it also has an egg tray for safe storage of eggs and comes with 1.8 L Chiller capacity. 7 L Crisper capacity, and 6 L SuperChill Zone capacity.
product_description.Cool and Quiet: A refrigerator that lets you keep your peace of mind, thanks to its Ultra Quiet technology, enabled by Friction Control components which reduce appliance working noises. The Power Capacitor which reduces compressor startling noises and an efficient design which further eliminates all tube-touching noises (less than 42 dB noise level).

review: Delivery late by 1day but product is good enough to impress anyone. suitable for single/double person only. can be use for upstairs bedrooms. over all nice 👍 product. satisfied with this purchase.

So its been 50 days since I've been using it.

* Its good enough for a single person if you do a lot of cooking and all.
* Too early to report any issues or whatsoever.
* Its really super silent as advertised. Previously got addicted to this videocon model buzzing sound that when I started using this, for the first day or a two, I was in a bit of doubt whether the fridge is operating or not!!
* Just cleared the built up frost yes'day for the first time by disconnecting power and leaving the door open for around 5-6hrs.
* The plug is 16A. There's no inbuilt stabilizer for this model. So I felt like its 'better safe than sorry' & got one VGSD 50 (8A) & it wont fit. Well I just sent it back and got VGSD 100 supreme model instead.
* One noticeable problem is there is no convenient way to place normal size water bottles.

Nice mini refrigerator from marq with great looks. Good for single person or for a family of two. The build quality is good. The cooling is average not as great as high end refrigerator but good enough to keep things fresh.
Great Buy... Very compact but sufficient fridge... Just go for it if you want compact fridge... Adequate for 4 people usage...

Price: 5 stars
power efficiency: 203 Units/ Year bearable 4 stars (5 if it was at least 3 stars)
cooling: 5 stars ( at 3rd switch, its enough for a chilled refrigerator with drinkable water. if you move to 4+ then that is super chilled)
space: 4 stars ( beautifully arranged, but the door racks should have been a little wider (could have adjusted 5 mm from the inner racks), so that bottle could fit easily, also the lowest door rack should have been a little taller.
aesthetics: 5 stars.

The overall average is: 4.6

Very nice refrigerator for bechelores especially for government transferable posting jobs very nice cooling but no internal led light , refrigerator shaking while door opening,1star rating and no mention about stabilizer free operation is disheartening overall decent products

Looks gud as look in pictures. But some time noise coming from back side iron vibration. It would be better if light was fixed.. reasonable and compact for single person.. Delivery was good and delivery person also so polite.

This Fridge is compact and stylish design, it works silent as described.

It can make ice in few hours in freezer, unfortunately freezer is not so powerful to keep ice cream frozen/hard.
Even after Keeping ice-cream in its freezer for 24 hrs, its still soft and not frozen, not a ideal fridge if you looking to store frozen food items like ice cream, frozen meat etc.
Very nice product from Flipkart at reasonable price. am happy with the product. looking good .thank you Flipkart

Compact fridge with good storage capabilities for its size. Ideal for a family of two. Looks good too. Have purchased Marq products before and feel that they offer good value for money and also offer quality products.
Delivery late by 1day but product is good enough to impress anyone. suitable for single/double person only. can be use for upstairs bedrooms. over all nice 👍 product. satisfied with this purchase.

So its been 50 days since I've been using it.

* Its good enough for a single person if you do a lot of cooking and all.
* Too early to report any issues or whatsoever.
* Its really super silent as advertised. Previously got addicted to this videocon model buzzing sound that when I started using this, for the first day or a two, I was in a bit of doubt whether the fridge is operating or not!!
* Just cleared the built up frost yes'day for the first time by disconnecting power and leaving the door open for around 5-6hrs.
* The plug is 16A. There's no inbuilt stabilizer for this model. So I felt like its 'better safe than sorry' & got one VGSD 50 (8A) & it wont fit. Well I just sent it back and got VGSD 100 supreme model instead.
* One noticeable problem is there is no convenient way to place normal size water bottles.

Compact fridge with good storage capabilities for its size. Ideal for a family of two. Looks good too. Have purchased Marq products before and feel that they offer good value for money and also offer quality products.

It is nice product in this range. It is good for single person use. it has been a month now and i feel the quality and features are great compared to other brands. As it is a Flipkart product you can contact and engage for maintenance very easily.
There is no heating issue yet.
I have read that the refrigerator shakes as it is light weight, but if you do not remove the base, (thermacol hatan mat niche se) it will not bother you.
No sound of motor.
No body heating issue. if it heats up a bit, it is due to bacteria control.
2-3 hours to form ice in normal weather.
I must say do not expect a 4 star product in such a low cost. You go higher with quality you can't skip the price. Compared to others Flipkart is providing a great deal at such a low cost. You should not think twice.

So far the performance has been good, no problems in cooling and making ice.fit & finish of the fridge is good, operation is virtually soundless

Good product for bachelors, small families on a budget, or students living in hostels or dorms. Capacity is adequate. Unlike the minifridge, it doesn't feel cramped at all, it's more like a downsized version of a regular fridge. You can store a big 2-liter bottle right at the door or a decent sized birthday cake along with a bunch of other stuff. Freezer works well and can accommodate 2 regular sized ice trays. The LED lamp is nice and bright. There is an egg tray included along with a small ice tray and a chilled tray. Door shelves and crisper drawer is plastic, the good kind and the racks are surprisingly enough, glass. I've had it for around 8 months now, it's very silent, cooling is effective but the defrosting is manual which seems fair at this price. Power consumption is also quite low. It comes with a 16A plug, I'm using a generic converter to plug it into a standard 6A socket, which technically isn't good but so far my house hasn't burned down. Overall I'm quite satisfied with this purchase and would happily recommend it.
